简体中文

Register

Developer Platform

Data Intelligent Operation

The user operation platform provides users with operation tools such as user grouping, data reports, email, app pop-ups, and app banners. At the same time, it strictly adheres to data privacy and security compliance requirements to ensure that user data collection is legal, compliant, and safe and reliable. This helps brand merchants establish a trustworthy image and reputation, better attract and retain users, and increase sales.

Consult Now

![](https://seapromotionstatic.cdn5th.com/static/470433627692589056.png)

Data Intelligent Operation

Use CasesArchitectureAdvantagesCasesGet Started

[

Consult Now

](https://www.tuya.com/contact)

Use Cases

Reduce the repetitive workload and improve efficiency

Improve App Ratings

Based on the life cycle and behavior path, invite specified users to give ratings. Thus, improve app ratings and receive more valuable suggestions.

![](https://seapromotionstatic.cdn5th.com/static/470441280103768064.png)

Boost Product & Service Sales

Determine users' purchase intentions based on user attributes and generate personalized recommendation strategies. Also, display and recommend products to target users through banners and splash screens on the app

![](https://seapromotionstatic.cdn5th.com/static/470441305508663296.png)

Optimize Device Pairing

If a user finds a device goes offline or cannot be added, tutorials or customer service entries can be recommended for the specified issue type, helping enhance user experience and reduce the return rate.

![](https://seapromotionstatic.cdn5th.com/static/470441334625521664.png)

Attract Huge Customers

Filter the user segments, integrate with various third-party marketing platforms such as Facebook and Instagram, and thus attract huge customers from public traffic.

![](https://seapromotionstatic.cdn5th.com/static/470441363553640448.png)

Architecture

How to Perform Fine-Grained Operations

Deliver the right message to the right audience at the right time depending on their behavior and labels

![](https://seapromotionstatic.cdn5th.com/static/475562167983394816.png)

Advantages

Multiple User Interaction Methods

![](https://seapromotionstatic.cdn5th.com/static/470445040125333504.png)

Email

Interaction is made possible just by email, a popular way to communicate worldwide. The users do not need to open the app.

![](https://seapromotionstatic.cdn5th.com/static/470445235357601792.png)

App Dialog

A dialog box pops up in response to a certain user action. This is the most common way to reach app users.

![](https://seapromotionstatic.cdn5th.com/static/470445357768368128.png)

App Notification

Notification: Push notifications are sent to users on the app. Users can open the app or navigate to the specified link simply by tapping a push notification.

![](https://seapromotionstatic.cdn5th.com/static/472606223011926016.png)

App Banner

Banners can be placed on the Home or Me page of the app for promotion. With one tap, users can navigate to the specified link.

![](https://seapromotionstatic.cdn5th.com/static/472606276476723200.png)

Splash Screen

A full-screen message forcibly appears on the splash screen. Excessive use of this feature might affect the user experience.

![](https://seapromotionstatic.cdn5th.com/static/472606308064026624.png)

App Review Request

You can invite highly active users to rate your app, which can help improve your app rating.

Cases

Best Practices

Experience

Improve Pairing Success Rate

The negative reviews of pairing have been reduced by 40%

The users' self-service issue resolution rate has reached 80%

![](https://seapromotionstatic.cdn5th.com/static/470469539679952896.png)

![](https://seapromotionstatic.cdn5th.com/static/470470761799471104.png)

Growth

Boost Software Revenues

The number of users that subscribe to the app services has grown by 30%

App service payment has substantially increased by 300%

Business inquiries

Initial communication

Project kickoff

Sign a contract and validate the solution.

Project delivery
